attachments.title: Avoid `rb_load_protect` as a workaround not to crash by ujihisa · Pull Request #2147 · vim/vim
attachments.text: Short summary: fix a segv for if_ruby. Problem Vim with +ruby causes segmentation fault when Ruby throws an exception inside :rubyfile command. echo 'raise' > /tmp/raise.rb vim -u NONE -N -c 'rubyf...
